title: brave-new-world
markdown:
# Brave New World

##### by Alduous Huxley

##### ?/5

### Why

recommended to me by a friend. 

### Start

Interesting scifi premise. I can see why it came my way. A tad dense for my taste.

title: flowers-for-algernon
markdown:
# flowers for algernon

##### 5/5

This is short and sweet and worth seeking out if you're ever feeling less than eternally grateful that you were able to parse this sentence.

title: hail-mary

### Why?

I enjoyed the Martian, both the novel and the movie. 

### Start

Fun enough premise.

title: lolita
markdown:
# Lolita

##### 5/5

Hauntingly beautiful. The prose shockingly good.

Recommend to anyone with a stomach.

title: the-epic-of-gilgamesh
markdown:
# The Epic of Gilgamesh

##### 5/5

What a ride. It was amazing to encounter the source of so many archetypes. And the story of its recovery from tablets is almost as fantastic as the tale itself. Love it.
